name: Lip Gloss
about: What it is:A high-shine, non-stick, long-lasting lip gloss with a clear, lightweight formula that helps nourish and smooth the lips..Formulation Type:Lip Gloss, Lip Balm & Treatment.Benefits:Hydrating, Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Works to attract and retain moisture to give the appearance of fuller lips..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:The formula helps to soften and hydrate the lips while the metal applicator leaves lips feeling cool and refreshed. It has been formulated to work perfectly with the REFY Lip Sculpt (sold separately) and act as a barrier to liner movement underneath.
ingredients: - Acide hyaluronique : Attire et retient lʼhydratation pour donner lʼapparence de lèvres plus pulpeuses..-huile de graine de jojoba : Favorise le collagène tout en nourrissant et en revitalisant les lèvres..-caprylyl glycol : Repulpe visiblement la peau et réduit l’apparence des ridules sèches. .. Polyisobuène, tridécyl Trimellitate, Octyldodecanol, silice diméthyl silylate, cire microcristalline hydrogénée, Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) huile de graine, cire d'abeille synthétique, Butyrosphermum parkii (karité) beurre, acétate de tocophéryle (vitamine E), Caprylyl glycol, hyaluronate de sodium, glyceryl Behénate, Limnanthes Alba (écume) huile de graine, phénoxyéthanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply product to lips after using REFY Lip Sculpt (sold separately), on top of other lip products, or on its own. .-Gently squeeze the tube to release a small amount of product onto the applicator..-Swipe evenly over lips...Recycling Instructions:.-All box packaging is fully recyclable..-The lip gloss is made from Zamac metal and plastic, which can be recycled in your home plastic recycling bin..-To recycle the Lip Gloss packaging, ensure it is empty of product.

reviews.review_title: I bring it with me everywhere
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t want to buy another clear gloss, but I caved in and I am so glad I did. This lip gloss is fantastic and is so shiny and beautiful! The applicator also is super unique and gives an extra little cooling effect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this, didn’t like it and then bought it again because I had completely forgotten. That’s how memorable it was at the time. I think I fell for the packaging. The metal applicator looks nice but ends up being quite messy since the gloss is thin and the tube leaks. I consider this more of a glossy lip balm like the Summer Fridays balm and not a true gloss. The formula is very thin not sticky, which means it’s gone in minutes. If you’re looking for a sheer gloss that feels nice on the lips and isn’t sticky, I love the Romand Glasting glosses. The colors are sheer and the consistency of the gloss is almost like a gel so it stays on the lips without being sticky. If you’re looking for a gloss gloss that lasts and makes your lips look juicy, you need a sticky gloss. Lawless and Makeup by Mario are my two current favorites for real lipgloss. Not recommended.

I removed and reapplied my lipstick with Dior lip oil, and it is still on after dinner, dessert, and I’ve been home for a half hour. Is this product exactly half the price of my Dior lip oils, yup! Love that! Unfortunately, it’s not a product I’m going to use because the longevity is less than an hour without drinking/eating anything. I like that it’s not too shiny and I like that there’s no wand, so it applies easily without a mirror and I can truly control how much product I am appt and exactly where, wit just feels less gross over time and more portable because of it’s size. But what I really really love is using this as a primer for my lipstick. This gloss seems to grip your mouth in a comfortable way and it is a little tacky. Applied sparingly it is the perfect layer of moisture under my lipstick and really helps my lipstick glide on and stay on, lipstick becomes very comfortable and long-wearing and my lips look hydrated and smooth. was genuinely surprised that I liked this product! Now I carry it in my pocket. Also the fact that it has no smell and no taste is HUGE. I hate flavored, scented makeup!

I genuinely carry this lip gloss with me everywhere. It's so hydrating and gives the best shine. I love putting this on top of the lip sculpt liners, but also love it for days when I want to keep it simple and just add a little gloss to my look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE gloss. It’s so perfect. Not sticky and not heavy.   Hydrating and ultra shiny!   The applicator is so cooling with the metal tip.  Will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_title: Only if you want the best.
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Anything Refy is top notch; this is no exception. Think clear lip gloss can’t be special? Think again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the PERFECT GLOSS. Not sticky, not runny, not thick - she’s stunning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is so worth the $20. i love the applicator its metal and flat on the other side to spread product. the formula is amazing, its not too thin nor thick. its super high shine. it feels like a balm but looks like a lipgloss. packaging is a bit ugly imo but thats the only con. i prefer this over the new kosas balm which gets goopy which this one doesnt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this despite the Sephora rep telling me it was meh. Previously I used tower 28, fenty, Sephora, Clinique etc. i like the amount of product you get compared to others and how the applicator makes it easy to go on. Very moisturizing and hydrating almost feels like a balm but with a high shine finish. I really enjoy this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my number one product. If I was stuck on a desert island and could only bring one thing it would be this lol. I panic when I don’t have it on my person at all times. The best clear gloss out there!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re thinking about getting this, just do it! It’s bomb! I am a lip gloss girl and have tried just about every one sephora has, this is at the top of my list pushing for my #1 favorite. I love a high glossy look that isn’t sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super hydrating and long wearing. Not too thin or thick. Perfect lightweight gloss/balm product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this lip gloss! Keeps my lip hydrated and is not sticky at all. Will definitely buy again! So glad I purchased it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely my new favorite lip gloss. OBSESSED. It’s not sticky AT ALL. It’s so smooth and the perfect amount of shiny. It’s beautiful by itself or layered over a lip liner or lip stick. Do yourself a favor and get it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using this lip gloss. I’m a sucker for gloss and lip oils and this one is at the top of my list. There is obviously a slight sticky feeling but it’s not nearly as sticky as most.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Can’t stop reapplying this! The formula is so soft and moisturizing, I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous, love the applicator and how smooth and delectable it makes my lips look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this on impulse and I’m so glad I did! It’s a nice thick gloss, not super sticky, and not overly fragranced — I really don’t smell anything which is an absolute bonus for me. It has great shine and feels cushiony and is moisturizing to boot. I def need to grab another one to keep in my purse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A simply gloss but it’s actually lovely! Not sticky at all and lasts a long time! So far, REFY is coming out with excellent products for that “clean girl” look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gloss! It makes my lips look so juicy and plump.. I have a ton of glosses but this was a nice addition to my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gloss. Super moisturizing and not sticky at all!  Leaves your lips glossy and I love the applicator. I take this everywhere I go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: it’s a nice lip gloss!! there’s nothing special about it, no special scent, no taste but i will say, it is extremely moisturizing. it’s a nice topper gloss
